DOC.brief_summary: This research is being done to learn if computer tasks that challenge the brain (cognitively stimulating tasks) can improve memory and other types of thinking. The study will compare the effects of different versions of the computer tasks. It also will compare the task performance of different groups of people.
DOC.criteria: age 1855 in methadone maintenance or healthy volunteers healthy Axis I disorder (except substance abuse and dependence in methadone maintenance patients) severe cognitive impairment serious untreated medical condition
